thread.title: Aimco Announces Dates for First Quarter 2018 Earnings Release and Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Aimco Announces Dates for First Quarter 2018 Earnings Release and Conference Call
text:
DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Apartment Investment and Management Company (“Aimco”) (NYSE: AIV) will release First Quarter 2018 earnings on Monday, May 7, 2018, after the market closes. The First Quarter 2018 earnings conference call will be conducted on Tuesday, May 8, 2018, at 1:00 p.m. Eastern time.
Live Conference Call
Domestic Dial-In Number: 1-888-317-6003
International Dial-In Number: 1-412-317-6061
Passcode: 1743062
Webcast: http://www.aimco.com/investors
Conference Call Replay
Domestic Dial-In Number: 1-877-344-7529
International Dial-In Number: 1-412-317-0088
Passcode: 10118742
The conference call replay will be available until August 8, 2018.
Webcast Replay: http://www.aimco.com/investors
Aimco is a real estate investment trust that is focused on the ownership and management of quality apartment communities located in the largest markets in the United States. Aimco is one of the country's largest owners and operators of apartments, with 180 communities in 22 states and the District of Columbia. Aimco common shares are traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol AIV, and are included in the S&P 500. For more information about Aimco, please visit our website at www.aimco.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180402005710/en/
Aimco
Suzanne Sorkin
Vice President – Investor Relations and FP&A
Investor Relations, 303-793-4661
Investor@aimco.com
Source: Aimco
